capabilities.name: Finance
capabilities.description: Requires advanced understanding and application of financial processes, including establishing new finance operations, policies, systems, and ensuring compliance with legislative, policy, and statutory frameworks.

capabilities.name: Demonstrate Accountability
capabilities.description: Responsible for accurate accounting, compliance with relevant frameworks, and supporting financial sustainability and strategic decision-making.

capabilities.name: Plan and Prioritise
capabilities.description: Needs to effectively plan and prioritise financial operations and reporting to support the organisation's objectives.

capabilities.name: Think and Solve Problems
capabilities.description: Requires the ability to analyse financial information, solve complex financial problems, and provide expert advice.

capabilities.name: Communicate Effectively
capabilities.description: Must communicate complex financial information clearly and effectively to stakeholders.

capabilities.name: Manage Reform and Change
capabilities.description: Supports the organisation through financial management and reporting changes, contributing to the transition to renewable energy.

capabilities.name: Work Collaboratively
capabilities.description: Collaborates with internal and external stakeholders to support financial sustainability and strategic decision-making.

skills.name: Financial Analysis
skills.description: Analyzing financial data to support decision-making and ensure compliance.

skills.name: Strategic Financial Planning
skills.description: Developing financial strategies to support the organisation's long-term goals.

skills.name: Stakeholder Communication
skills.description: Communicating financial information and strategies effectively to stakeholders.

skills.name: Legislative Compliance
skills.description: Ensuring all financial operations comply with relevant legislation, policies, and standards.

generalRole.title: Senior Financial Accountant
generalRole.description: This role involves advanced financial management, including planning, analysis, compliance, and strategic decision-making to support the organisation's financial sustainability and strategic objectives.
